main event: A civilian reported seeing an oblong object change color and direction over Lovells, Michigan on September 10, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes,The object changed colors from bright white to dull blue and back,The trajectory of the object changed from horizontal to vertical,The observer estimated the object's speed to be faster than any known aircraft,The case concluded that the object could possibly be a balloon or aircraft due to insufficient data.
witness description: civilian young male standing in an open field
